How WeddingLens Works

A simple and secure way to rent photography equipment and find trusted professionals

👤
1

Create Your Profile

Sign up as a photographer or renter. Upload your NID for verification and build your portfolio.

🔍
2

Browse & Book

Find equipment or photographers in your area. Check availability and make secure bookings.

💳
3

Secure Payment

Pay safely through our integrated gateway with card, bKash, or bank transfer. Funds held in escrow.

📸
4

Meet & Create

Meet up, exchange equipment or start your photoshoot. Create amazing memories together.

⭐
5

Rate & Review

Leave honest reviews to help build trust in our community of verified photographers.
